title: Inside Europe 21.04.2022
description: Critics slam the UK’S plans to send asylum seekers to Rwanda - The German chancellor under fire over weapons for Ukraine - Concern in Moldova that it, too, is in Russia’s crosshairs - Protests in Turkey as the authorities seek to silence a women’s rights group - And On the Green Fence: How clean is the River Rhine
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Inside Europe, Helen Seeney, Ukraine war, asylum seekers, UK, Rwanda, Rhine River, Turkey femicide, Moldova, Olaf Scholz
